quotes: To be truly ignorant, be content with your own knowledge.
Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.
If you want peace, accept. If you want suffering, expect.
There is peace even in the storm.
Things may come to those who wait, but only the things left by those who hustle.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Only one thing is ever guaranteed, that is that you will definitely not achieve the goal if you don't take the shot.
Live simply, expect little, give much.
By perseverance the snail reached the ark.
Poetry is written with tears, fiction with blood, and history with invisible ink.
When we think about our strengths, we are strong. When we think about our weaknesses, we are weak.
Simplicity is a difficult thing to achieve.
Those who attain the middle Dominate the whole.
The biggest and only critic lives in your perception of people's perception of you rather than people's perception of you.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goals.
I have lost friends, some by death...others by sheer inability to cross the street.
Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
Every adversity, every failure, every heartbreak, carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
Time and health are two precious assets that we don't recognize and appreciate until they have been depleted.
Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
One always begins to forgive a place as soon as it's left behind.
It is better to change an opinion than to persist in a wrong one.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable.
Laws are like cobwebs, which may catch small flies, but let wasps and hornets break through.
My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.
Throughout this life, you can never be certain of living long enough to take another breath.
Living life in style also means living a life of balance.
He who laughs at himself never runs out of things to laugh at.
Life and the simple beauty of it is too good to pass up.
In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.
Time goes from present to past.
To be prepared is half the victory.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
Either you choose to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out into the ocean.
Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
Love is the absence of judgment.
Pleasure is always derived from something outside you, whereas joy arises from within.
This is such a short and precious life that it's really important that you don't spend it being unhappy.
The person who says something is impossible should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
Fiction is the truth inside the lie.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any.
Always look on the bright side of things. If you can't comprehend this, polish that which has become dull until it begins to shine.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
To be of use to the world is the only way to be happy.
It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
